SELECT NM.NMNO, NM.NM_CATEGORY, NM.CNO, NM.NM_TITLE, NM.NM_INTRO, NM.CREATE_DATE, NM.IS_OPEN, NM.STATUS, M.PROFILENAME, M.NICNAME FROM NARUMARU NM JOIN MARU_MEMBER MA ON(NM.NMNO = MA.NMNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(MA.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE NM_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchCondition} || '%'

SELECT NMNO, NM_CATEGORY, CNO, NM_TITLE, NM_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IS_OPEN, STATUS, PROFILENAME, NICNAME, NEIGHBOR_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NEIGHBOR_COUNT DESC) AS MEMBER_RANK FROM (SELECT NM.NMNO, NM.NM_CATEGORY, NM.CNO, NM.NM_TITLE, NM.NM_INTRO, NM.CREATE_DATE, NM.IS_OPEN, NM.STATUS, M.PROFILENAME, M.NICNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEIGHBOR WHERE NEIGHBOR_MNO = MA.MNO) AS NEIGHBOR_COUNT, ROWNUM FROM NARUMARU NM JOIN MARU_MEMBER MA ON(NM.NMNO = MA.NMNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(MA.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY = 2 ORDER BY NEIGHBOR_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT NMNO, NM_CATEGORY, CNO, NM_TITLE, NM_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IS_OPEN, STATUS, PROFILENAME, NICNAME, MEMBER_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MEMBER_COUNT DESC) AS MEMBER_RANK FROM(SELECT NM.NMNO, NM.NM_CATEGORY, NM.CNO, NM.NM_TITLE, NM.NM_INTRO, NM.CREATE_DATE, NM.IS_OPEN, NM.STATUS, M.PROFILENAME, M.NICNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARU_MEMBER MA2 WHERE MA2.NMNO = NM.NMNO) AS MEMBER_COUNT, ROWNUM FROM NARUMARU NM JOIN MARU_MEMBER MA ON(NM.NMNO = MA.NMNO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(MA.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE NM.NM_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY MEMBER_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
